name: Leiki
tag_list: semantic-advertising, contextual-targeting, behavioral-targeting, automatic-content-discovery, automatic-recommendation, contextual-recommendation, behavioral-recommendation, targeted-advertising
overview:
From Search to Discovery. From Brands to Relevancy.

Leiki provides patented software technology that automatically targets advertising and personalises content and community services. The functionality is based on the most detailed automatic content analysis and real-time learning of the user’s preferences.

Leiki presents a paradigm shift for the online world.

The majority of users interested in a topic do not search for it. We change the main method of finding content from search to automatic discovery by recommending personally relevant items from the whole inventory of the publisher or the advertiser, increasing traffic, audience and revenues for all sites.

Moving the focus from individual content brands to relevancy, our automatic discovery creates a personal content space with high user retention within the group of brands.

We take the control of traffic flows â€“ and your online business â€“ away from search engines and give it back to the content owner.

Instead of the human adapting to the machine, we make the machine adapt to the human.

Leiki’s customers include Trinity Mirror, The Independent, Financial Times, BBC, Sina, Nokia and Sun Microsystems.

milestones.description: Leiki is live with Trinity Mirror.
